mapper.select: select sum(${payment}) as "total_payment", count(${table}.aac001) as "person_num", aac004 as "sex",the_year as "year", month_of_year as "month" from ${table} join time on the_date= aae036 join ac01 on ac01.aac001=${table}.aac001 group by aac004,the_year,month_of_year order by the_year,month_of_year,sex

select count(distinct ac20.aac001) as "person_num", sum(aac123) as "total_charges", aac004 as "sex",aac012 as "occupation", the_year as "year", month_of_year as "month" from ac20 join time on the_date=aab193 join ac01 on ac01.aac001=ac20.aac001 group by aac004,aac012,the_year,month_of_year order by the_year,month_of_year,aac004,aac012
